website_summaries.verdict: The best coolant and antifreeze for repairing slow leaks in your marine cooling system, as Star-Cool guards your engine against wider ranges of temperature extremes than competing brands.
pros: Protects against freezing temperatures up to freezing to -26°F
cons: A fairly pricy coolant, but its additional engine-protecting features makes Star-Cool a premium coolant

customer_reviews.title: Better than engine ice!
customer_reviews.text: It is better than engine ice is all I can say. I was really impressed and blown away by how this product performs. I made sure I flushed the radiator 3x by running 50/50 water and vinegar mixture and flushing with distilled water til it is clear.l, then fill the coolant. This is one of best coolant we have ever used and we have used everything. We have also switched out the vehicles we have in Asia where it gets to 40c / 104F sitting in traffic for 2 hours. 4 years since and no scaling or corrossion. The lavramon machine was clear. We change every 2 years.
customer_reviews.author: IB

customer_reviews.title: Motorcycle safe nontoxic coolant with great heat/cold properties
customer_reviews.text: Great ready to use coolant. Wish they sold it in a concentrated form, other than that it's my new go-to coolant for all 8 of my motorcycles. Boil point is lower than glycol but higher than water, non-corrosive, and compatible with other coolants. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: T. G.

customer_reviews.title: Worth A Try
customer_reviews.text: Have had this in both Infiniti g35s I have owned. Very good stuff and no issues to date. Also notice the engine fan hardly ever kicks on now vs using Prestone Universal Coolant (yellow bottle).
customer_reviews.author: Placesandspaces

customer_reviews.title: Just was not for me
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I used it wrong but I will tell you where I was going with this. The wife's BMW the thermostat opens at 210 degrees and the thermostat cap is 30lbs that's just a lot of pressure in that system. I figured that this would help in that situation with the higher boiling point it did not. Shortly after installing this I blew my water pump as well. Can't blame that here but you never know. I will tell you I purchased the Evans waterless coolant and have not had an issue
customer_reviews.author: RichardEGagne

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff, stabilizes engine temps
customer_reviews.text: This is a superb product. It won't mess up your computer by running cooler, rather it maintains a very stable, ideal temp for the engine and components!
customer_reviews.author: M.R.E

customer_reviews.title: great coolant
customer_reviews.text: Very good coolant so I ordered 4 more gallons for my truck and don't but that Evans waterless coolant its bad news
customer_reviews.author: keith stamps

customer_reviews.title: It's environmentally safe
customer_reviews.text: Installed as part of a fluids flush, last week. I'll follow up with a review in about a month, but no overheating at all.
customer_reviews.author: Marvin Myers

customer_reviews.title: Didn't notice any difference in temperature which is what I ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't notice any difference in temperature which is what I was hoping for but at the same time no issues/complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn K

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff my grizzly wheeler runs a lot cooler, the fan kicks on a lot less!
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Keeping it Cool
customer_reviews.text: I use all Synthetic products in everything that consumes Diesel fuel or Gasoline. It's the best there is
customer_reviews.author: Hoss

customer_reviews.title: Cool Product
customer_reviews.text: A bit early to review its effectiveness, but I have high expectations. Used in a Suzuki M109R, one of the premier bad ass bikes out there on the streets in the "cruiser" category.
customer_reviews.author: TMC

product_meta.title: STAR BRITE Star-Cool Premium Synthetic PG Engine Coolant - 1 Gallon
product_meta.description:
Size:1 Gallon

Star brite worked with the world’s leading formulators of coolant additives to develop a product that significantly outperforms traditional coolants and helps engines develop maximum horsepower. Star Cool combines an essentially non-toxic propylene glycol base with unique poly organic additives (POAT) to create the most technologically advanced engine coolant.

Star Cool is the best choice for all high-performance engines. With a service life of up to 2+ years, 250,000 miles or 4,000 hours in gasoline engines (750,000 miles, 7+ years or 12,500 hours in diesel engines) it goes significantly beyond all OEM specifications. Star Cool passivates metal surfaces to create a barrier to corrosion and will seal pinhole leaks or small cracks. Pre-mixed with de-ionized water, it is ready to use and safe for all water-cooled gas or diesel-powered engines. Star Cool is ideal for year-round use; protecting against boilover to 265°F and freezing to -26°F (with 15 psi cap).
feature_bullets: PCT additive package maintains engine temperature to develop maximum horsepower
Reduces operating temperatures faster than other coolants
Meets or exceeds all OEM and appropriate ASTM specs
Formulated to seal pinhole leaks or fissures
Non-toxic - Does not contain ethylene glycol

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars43 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
